document.full_text: a judge has ruled that he would select a psychiatrist to conduct a second, independent evaluation of arizona shooting rampage suspect jared lee loughner, reversing an earlier decision to leave the choice to defense lawyers.
document.title: judge reverses ruling on loughner mental exam
lines_and_colors: a judge has ruled that he would select a psychiatrist to conduct a second, independent evaluation of arizona shooting rampage suspect jared lee loughner, reversing an earlier decision to leave the choice to defense lawyers.
